attributes.action: To promote Helen Southworth's Care Leaver's (Accommodation) Bill to Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support Helen Southworth's Care Leaver's (Accommodation) Bill - First Reading at Parliament 27 Jan 2010; Second Reading, 12 March 2010 - that endeavours to ensure that Care Leaver's can expect a minimum standard of accommodation upon their approach to leaving care and in the years thereafter. That the word the Local Authority must adhere to is a defined "minimum" accommodation as oppose to the presently undefined "suitable accommodation". Thank you!
